attributes.title: ugh worst app ever
attributes.review: Also, no trump for prison 2020. Don‚Äôt get all mad that we do not approve of the app, clearly your one-sided bigoted stance has little to no affect of keeping this garbage app. All the middle-aged Karen‚Äôs and bills, sit down üòå. Gen z got this üí´üßöüèª‍‚ôÇÔ∏è. We do not need to be taught respect, we already are respectful. If you had any brain, you‚Äôd notice that disrespectful people support trump. Anyways.....After waiting nearly 2 weeks for the app to download, every time I went on the app it crashed. It was so hard to use that once I registered for the New Hampshire rally, I found out I cannot attend because I have to walk my pet roach that day. The app malfunctions all the time and always spazzes out by playing Sofia the First intro theme song. Trump is so ugly that every time I open the app and it DOES work and I see his face, I vomit. Not only does the app not even work, but it makes me physically sick. Bleh. This app deserves no place on the App Store and should be deleted entirely as it serves little to no purpose and other apps, such as tik tok, deserve a place on this App Store and have been recognized for how great the app is. By far the worst app ever, literally broke my phone and made it catch on fire. -1000/10 do not recommend.

attributes.title: Horribleness in one app
attributes.review:
The mobile app for Donald Trump's 2020 re-election campaign collects vast amounts of personal data and is a privacy risk, experts say. Distributed via the App Store and Google Play Store, the "Official Trump 2020 App" has been criticized by cyber security researchers, who raised concerns about the amount of permissions the software requests after being installed on a user's device.
The app seeks a cell phone number for verification alongside personal details including name, home address and zip code. Once downloaded, it seeks access to contacts, rough location, Bluetooth pairing, storage, ID and call information and more.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever gotten. It took forever to download and completely broke my phone, wiped everything off of it and caused it to explode. The explosion hit my glass cup and broke it. The glass flew everywhere and a piece landed in my sister. It got into her blood stream and she is now dying because of it. My sister is dying, in the hospital because of this absolutely disgusting app. DONT GET IT.period

attributes.title: Bad juju from this app
attributes.review:
